response.overview: Space, Fehmi and the Secrets of the City, replaces the traditional narration of Mardin as a “fairy tale city” with a tale of space adventure set in Mardin. the hospitable narrator of the film believes that Noah’s Ark was fi lled with types of people, not animals. We meet Fehmi, who might as well be Noah; according to the narrator, secretly wants to go to space or perhaps he is actually from there…
response.tagline: Space, Fehmi and the Secrets of the City
response.title: Uzay, Fehmi ve Şehrin Sırları
